verses.verse: SHa'ul <WG3972>, an emissary <WG652> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> by <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, according to <WG2596> the promise <WG1860> of life <WG2222> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>,

To Timothy <WG5095>, my dearly beloved <WG27> son <WG5043>: Grace <WG5485>, mercy <WG1656>, and peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962>.

I thank <WG2192> <WG5719> <WG5485> 'Elohim <WG2316>, whom <WG3739> I serve <WG3000> <WG5719> from <WG575> my forefathers <WG4269> with <WG1722> pure <WG2513> conscience <WG4893>, that <WG5613> without ceasing <WG88> I have <WG2192> <WG5719> remembrance <WG3417> of <WG4012> thee <WG4675> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> prayers <WG1162> night <WG3571> and <WG2532> day <WG2250>;

Greatly desiring <WG1971> <WG5723> to see <WG1492> <WG5629> thee <WG4571>, being mindful <WG3415> <WG5772> of thy <WG4675> tears <WG1144>, that <WG2443> I may be filled <WG4137> <WG5686> with joy <WG5479>;

When I call <WG2983> <WG5723> to remembrance <WG5280> the unfeigned <WG505> faith <WG4102> that is in <WG1722> thee <WG4671>, which <WG3748> dwelt <WG1774> <WG5656> first <WG4412> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> grandmother <WG3125> Lois <WG3090>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> mother <WG3384> Eunice <WG2131>; and <WG1161> I am persuaded <WG3982> <WG5769> that <WG3754> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> also <WG2532>.

Wherefore <WG1223> <WG3739> <WG156> I put <WG363> thee <WG4571> in remembrance <WG363> <WG5719> that thou stir up <WG329> <WG5721> the gift <WG5486> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> by <WG1223> the putting on <WG1936> of my <WG3450> hands <WG5495>.

For <WG1063> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath <WG1325> not <WG3756> given <WG1325> <WG5656> us <WG2254> the spirit <WG4151> of fear <WG1167>; but <WG235> of power <WG1411>, and <WG2532> of love <WG26>, and <WG2532> of a sound mind <WG4995>.

Be <WG1870> not <WG3361> thou <WG1870> therefore <WG3767> ashamed <WG1870> <WG5680> of the testimony <WG3142> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962>, nor <WG3366> of me <WG1691> his <WG846> prisoner <WG1198>: but <WG235> be thou partaker of the afflictions <WG4777> <WG5657> of the gospel <WG2098> according to <WG2596> the power <WG1411> of 'Elohim <WG2316>;

Who <WG3588> hath saved <WG4982> <WG5660> us <WG2248>, and <WG2532> called <WG2564> <WG5660> us with an holy <WG40> calling <WG2821>, not <WG3756> according to <WG2596> our <WG2257> works <WG2041>, but <WG235> according to <WG2596> his own <WG2398> purpose <WG4286> and <WG2532> grace <WG5485>, which <WG3588> was given <WG1325> <WG5685> us <WG2254> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> before <WG4253> the world began <WG5550> <WG166>,

But <WG1161> is <WG5319> now <WG3568> made manifest <WG5319> <WG5685> by <WG1223> the appearing <WG2015> of our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, who <WG3303> hath abolished <WG2673> <WG5660> death <WG2288>, and <WG1161> hath brought <WG5461> life <WG2222> and <WG2532> immortality <WG861> to light <WG5461> <WG5660> through <WG1223> the gospel <WG2098>:
Whereunto <WG1519> <WG3739> I <WG1473> am appointed <WG5087> <WG5681> a preacher <WG2783>, and <WG2532> an emissary <WG652>, and <WG2532> a teacher <WG1320> of the goyim <WG1484>.

For <WG1223> the which <WG3739> cause <WG156> I <WG3958> also <WG2532> suffer <WG3958> <WG5719> these things <WG5023>: nevertheless <WG235> I am <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> <WG5736>: for <WG1063> I know <WG1492> <WG5758> whom <WG3739> I have believed <WG4100> <WG5758>, and <WG2532> am persuaded <WG3982> <WG5769> that <WG3754> he is <WG2076> <WG5748> able <WG1415> to keep <WG5442> <WG5658> that which I <WG3450> have committed unto him <WG3866> against <WG1519> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>.

Hold fast <WG2192> <WG5720> the form <WG5296> of sound <WG5198> <WG5723> words <WG3056>, which <WG3739> thou hast heard <WG191> <WG5656> of <WG3844> me <WG1700>, in <WG1722> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> love <WG26> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.
That good thing <WG2570> which was committed unto thee <WG3872> keep <WG5442> <WG5657> by <WG1223> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> which <WG3588> dwelleth <WG1774> <WG5723> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>.

This <WG5124> thou knowest <WG1492> <WG5758>, that <WG3754> all <WG3956> they which are in <WG1722> Asia <WG773> be turned away from <WG654> <WG5648> me <WG3165>; of whom <WG3739> are <WG2076> <WG5748> Phygellus <WG5436> and <WG2532> Hermogenes <WG2061>.

The YY <WG2962> give <WG1325> <WG5630> mercy <WG1656> unto the house <WG3624> of Onesiphorus <WG3683>; for <WG3754> he <WG404> oft <WG4178> refreshed <WG404> <WG5656> me <WG3165>, and <WG2532> was <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> <WG5681> of my <WG3450> chain <WG254>:
But <WG235>, when he was <WG1096> <WG5637> in <WG1722> Rome <WG4516>, he sought <WG2212> me <WG3165> out <WG2212> <WG5656> very diligently <WG4706>, and <WG2532> found <WG2147> <WG5627> me.

The YY <WG2962> grant <WG1325> <WG5630> unto him <WG846> that he may find <WG2147> <WG5629> mercy <WG1656> of <WG3844> the YY <WG2962> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>: and <WG2532> in how many things <WG3745> he ministered unto me <WG1247> <WG5656> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181>, thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1097> <WG5719> very well <WG957>.
